DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate long-term safety , tolerability , efficacy MP-214 patient receive multiple drug schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Study MP-214 Patients With Receiving Multiple Drugs Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent obtain patient initiation studyspecific procedures Patients diagnose schizophrenia accord diagnostic criterion Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) criterion schizophrenia Patients receive 1 antipsychotic drug Patients normal physical examination , laboratory , vital sign , and/or electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Patients DSMIVTR diagnosis schizoaffective disorder , schizophreniform disorder , psychotic disorder schizophrenia , bipolar I II disorder
